  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>440105806</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Dedication to Douglass - Designing Historically Accurate Monuments to Frederick Douglass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Widmung zu Douglass - genaue Denkmäler zu 
Frederick Douglass historisch konzipieren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attachement à Douglass - concevoir historiquement
les monuments précis à Frederick Douglass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dedication a Douglass - projetando historicamente 
monumentos exatos a Frederick Douglass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dedica a Douglass - progettare storicamente i 
monumenti esatti a Frederick Douglass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αφιέρωση σε Douglass - που σχεδιάζει ιστορικά τα 
ακριβή μνημεία σε Frederick Douglass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esmero a Douglass - diseñar históricamente los 
monumentos exactos a Frederick Douglass</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this lesson, students learn about the controversy regarding the historical accuracy of the Frederick Douglass Circle monument in Central Park. They then create their own design proposals for less controversial monument components and write the text for plaques to accompany them.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Lektion erlernen Kursteilnehmer über 
die Kontroverse betreffend ist die historische Genauigkeit des 
Frederick Douglass Kreisdenkmales in Central Park. Sie dann 
erstellen ihre eigenen Designanträge für weniger umstrittene 
Denkmalbestandteile und schreiben den Text, damit Plaketten sie 
begleiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette leçon, les étudiants se renseignent 
sur la polémique concernant l'exactitude historique du monument de 
cercle de Frederick Douglass en parc central. Ils alors créent 
leurs propres propositions de conception pour les composants moins 
controversés de monument et écrivent le texte pour que les plaques 
les accompagnent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta lição, os estudantes aprendem sobre a 
controvérsia a respeito da exatidão histórica do monumento do 
círculo de Frederick Douglass em Central Park. Então críam 
suas próprias propostas do projeto para componentes mais menos 
controversos do monumento e escrevem o texto para que as chapas 
acompanhem-nas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa lezione, gli allievi imparano circa la 
polemica per quanto riguarda l'esattezza storica del monumento del 
cerchio di Frederick Douglass in Central Park. Allora creano le 
loro proprie proposte di disegno di componenti meno discutibili del 
monumento e scrivono il testo affinchè le piastre le accompagnino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτό το μάθημα, οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τη 
διαμάχη σχετικά με την ιστορική ακρίβεια του μνημείου κύκλων 
Frederick Douglass στο κεντρικό πάρκο. Δημιουργούν 
έπειτα τις προτάσεις σχεδίου τους για τα λιγότερο αμφισβητούμενα 
τμήματα μνημείων και γράφουν το κείμενο για τις πινακίδες για να 
τις συνοδεύσουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta lección, los estudiantes aprenden sobre 
la controversia con respecto a la exactitud histórica del monumento 
del círculo de Frederick Douglass en parque central. Después 
crean sus propias ofertas del diseño para los componentes menos 
polémicos del monumento y escriben el texto para que las placas las 
acompañen.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
